text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the GIGABYTE AERO 15-X9-RT5P Core i7-8750H NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 1 TB Intel SSD Win10 Pro 15.6" FHD LG IPS 144 Hz Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2070 in the GIGABYTE AERO 15-X9-RT5P Core i7-8750H NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 16 GB Memory 1 TB Intel SSD Win10 Pro 15.6" FHD LG IPS 144 Hz Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
